Articles.Content: Orion Multi-purpose crew vehicle discussion's heaven! Anyway, anyone notice the more you talk about the Orion Spacecraft the more closer it comes to testing it in December? Its starting to get freaky!

The more you do an activity that takes time, the closer you are to an arbitrary point in the future?

Its starting to get freaky!

Isn't that just the normal passage of time?
Is it just me or when I see the title, I immediately think about the Orion Project instead of the real Orion spacecraft?
Well, what can I say, it seems to be getting put together nicely and it will look awesome! I am really waiting to see the test launch! I hope the fancy LES will work.
Yeah it'll be awesome seeing it go up there and the re-entry tests and stuff haha can't wait for December!
